markdownRemark.html: The resort is located near the Jerez speed circuit, just a few minutes drive from Jerez. The golf course is situated on the grounds of a cozy, quiet hotel and the magnificent golf course was design by Jack Niclaus.

frontmatter.title: Barceló Montecastillo Golf Club
frontmatter.description: Barceló Montecastillo Golf Club - The resort is located near the Jerez speed circuit, just a few minutes drive from Jerez. The golf course is situated on the grounds of a cozy, quiet hotel and the magnificent golf course was design by Jack Niclaus.
frontmatter.address: Ctra. Arcos, km. 6, 11406, Jerez de la Frontera, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 90.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 90.00 euros
